_description: A prayer tag to be used with the Psalter of Jesus — four monorhyming lines

CamTCC1157.Transcription:
Ihesu mercy and graunt mercyIhesu for thy mekyll mercyAs tow art
                    rote andwell of mercySo mercyfull Ihesu haue mercy on me
CamTCC1157.Attributed Title:
The Psalter of Jhesu is to sey on the first pater noster thies
                    wordys folowying [with further instructions following] (f. 73)
CamTCC1157.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 8.
